section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Byron R. White

turn.speaker: william_h_rehnquist
turn.label: Chief Justice William H. Rehnquist
turn.text: The opinion of the Court in No. 86-958, Norwest Bank Worthington versus Ahlers will be announced by Justice White.

turn.speaker: byron_r_white
turn.label: Justice Byron R. White
turn.text: We review a judgment of the Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit in this case and for the reasons stated in an opinion that is on file, we reverse the judgment of the Court of Appeals.
Justice Kennedy took no part in the case and the opinion is otherwise unanimous.
